prototypes.prototype: Script_List as C = :A5.UDF_ENUM( [ object_enum_flags as N ] )
Next_Script_Name as C = :A5.UDF_ENUM( lastname as C )

argument.name: Script_List
argument.description: A list of scripts in various formats, depending on the Flag variable.

argument.name: Next_Script_Name
argument.description: The next script in the list of scripts.

item.name: Null = Script name, full path, and filename.
4 = Object type, script name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted script name, full path, and filename.
12 = Object type, quoted script name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control.

argument.name: lastname
argument.description: The quoted name of a script.

page.description: Returns the name of the next saved Global Function in the current database.
page.discussion: The A5.UDF_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all user defined functions (UDFs) in the database.
page.original:
A5.UDF_ENUM() Syntax
ArgumentDescription Script_ListA list of scripts in various formats, depending on the Flag variable. Next_Script_NameThe next script in the list of scripts. FlagOptional. Default = Null.
Null = Script name, full path, and filename.
2 = Script name
4 = Object type, script name, full path, and filename
8 = Quoted script name, full path, and filename.
12 = Object type, quoted script name, full path, and filename formatted for tree control. Script_NameThe quoted name of a script.
Description The A5.UDF_ENUM() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of all user defined functions (UDFs) in the database. Example Refer to A5 Enumeration Methods. See Also Script Functions and Methods, A5 Enumeration Methods
